<html><head><title><?PHP echo htmlspecialchars(SITE_NAME, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?></title><meta charset="UTF-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=no"><link rel="stylesheet" href="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($this->root, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>style"><script src="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($this->root, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>script" async="async"></script></head><body>
        <div id="wrapper">
            <?PHP if(isset($_SESSION['username']) === true){?><form method="post" action="">
                <input type="submit" name="logout" value="Log out"></form><?PHP }?>
            <h1><?PHP echo htmlspecialchars(SITE_NAME, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?> search for “<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($keyword, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>”</h1>
            <?PHP if(empty($results) === true){?><p class="notice">There is no result.</p><?PHP }else{?>
            <section><form name="search" action="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($this->root, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>search/" method="get">
                    <p><input type="search" name="keyword" value="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($keyword, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>"><button type="submit" name="search" value="find">Find</button></p>
                </form>
                <ul><?PHP foreach($results as $result){?><li>
                        <p><a href="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($this->root.'topic/'.$result['topic_id'], ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>"><?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($result['title'], ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?></a></p>
                        <?PHP if(empty($result['comments']) === false){?><blockquote><?PHP foreach(explode('<>', $result['comments']) as $i=>$comment){?>
                            <?PHP 
                                if ($i === 5) break;
                                $sep = strpos($comment, ' ');
                                $comment_id = substr($comment, 0, $sep);
                                $line = substr($comment, $sep+1);
                                if (preg_match('/(\w{0,10}?(?='.$keyword.'))('.$keyword.')(\w{0,10})/uis', $line, $matches) === 0) {
                                    $line = false;
                                } else {
                                    $line = implode('<strong>'.$keyword.'</strong>', explode($keyword, $matches[0]));
                                    $url = $this->root.'topic/'.$result['topic_id'];
                                    if ($comment_id > LIST_ITEM_LIMIT) {
                                        $url .= '/'.ceil($comment_id / LIST_ITEM_LIMIT).'#c'.$comment_id;
                                    } else {
                                        $url .= '#c'.$comment_id;
                                    }
                                }
                             ?><?PHP if($line !== false){?><q><a href="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($url, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>"><?PHP echo (($line));?></a></q><?PHP }?>
                        <?PHP }?></blockquote><?PHP }?>
                    </li>
                <?PHP }?></ul></section><?PHP }?><?PHP if(empty($result_limit) === false && $result_limit > 1){?><nav><ul id="paging"><?PHP for($i=1; $i < $result_limit + 1; $i++){?><li>
                        <?PHP if($i === $index + 1){?><strong><?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($i, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?></strong><?PHP }else{?>
                        <a href="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($this->root.$i, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>"><?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($i, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>
                    </a><?PHP }?></li>
                <?PHP }?></ul></nav><?PHP }?><footer><p><a href="<?PHP echo htmlspecialchars($this->root, ENT_COMPAT,"UTF-8", false);?>">HOME</a></p>
            </footer></div>
    </body></html>
